You can move cards in and out of your sanctum in sideboarding, provided that all the cards in it can start there.

cards.rules_text: [i]Augmented – [/i]Exile Sailing the Starsea: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may instead copy target spell you control twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
